short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts HTML class names to CSS selectors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a FullStory superuser who is sick of manually converting a bunch of HTML class names to CSS selectors? 😓

Well this elegant and time-saving tool for FullStory superusers converts HTML class names to CSS selectors in a flash, saving you time and pain from this tedious task. 💪🏽

Spend more time gaining insights from your users instead. 😍
